name: Dragon Animal Spirit Bracelet
description:
Jaspers are extremely nurturing stones and work in a subtle way to give slow and gentle healing. They are also extremely protective stones, protecting against depression and negative thinking. In addition Jaspers are said to encourage a determination to succeed and to see ideas through into action.

Dragon spirit is a loving totem and very protective of the earth. Dragon can be playful and magical but also intense at times. Being so connected to the earth they can assist in manifestation. Quite the fun and mysterious totem.

Bracelet consists of brass, Dalmatian Jasper and fine silver.
Length 7" plus 1.5" extension.

*All stones have been cleared and aligned with the energy of the animal by me.

name: Wolf Animal Spirit Bracelet
description:
The wolf spirit totem symbolizes your inner teacher. Trust in your many senses and intuition. You will then connect to your meaning and blaze your own path on the journey of life.

Labradorite Crystal is a stone of magic... awakening within you mystical and magical abilities and psychic powers. It has within it a deeply felt resonance that is very powerful.

Bracelet consists of brass, Labradorite and fine silver.
Length 7" plus 1.5 extension.  

*All stones have been cleared and aligned with the energy of the animal by me.

name: Dragon Animal Spirit Necklace
description:
Jaspers are extremely nurturing stones and work in a subtle way to give slow and gentle healing. They are also extremely protective stones, protecting against depression and negative thinking. In addition Jaspers are said to encourage a determination to succeed and to see ideas through into action.

Dragon spirit is a loving totem and very protective of the earth. Dragon can be playful and magical but also intense at times. Being so connected to the earth they can assist in manifestation. Quite the fun and mysterious totem.

Necklace consists of brass, Dalmatian Jasper and sterling silver.
Length 18"  **Longer lengths available. Contact me with your request.

name: Fae Pod Necklace Peruvian Opal
description:
A hammered silver organic shaped pod suspends an array of gems in this delicate enchanting necklace. 

Peruvian Opal, Moon Stone, crystal, sterling silver.
17" brass ox chain with 1" extender. 
Pendant measures 1.5"

name: Bridge Necklace Pink Opal
description:
Long semi-precious necklace with hand forged brass elements. 

Pink opal rondelles, carnelian, brass beads.
32" brass ox chain.
